ygData.subject: Archery is GOOD
ygData.msgSnippet: It s not a cowardly weapon at all.  In fact, I saved someone s life yesterday while using a bow.  He had a Kodiac chasing him in the commons and I came to his
ygData.messageBody:
It's not a cowardly weapon at all. In fact, I saved someone's life
yesterday while using a bow. He had a Kodiac chasing him in the commons and
I came to his rescue and hit the bear with a bow shot since there was no way
that I could have caught up to him. This distracted the bear long enough
for the rescuee to escape to safety. (of course I had a tough battle on my
hands and without my trusty Cleric sidekick, the bear would have probably
finished me as well) I would have to agree that it's not very paladin like
to stand back and pound shots into something while you let someone else
tank, but saving that person's life changed my attitude. Another nice thing
about the bow is that you can shoot while running. This you cannot do while
casting spells and while everyone likes root, I found that most of the time
the target would either resist it or run past my spell range (when I was
playing a class that had it)

-Bamphir of the 10th level on Tarrew Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Kevin Byer [SMTP:kbyer@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 9:43 AM
To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Archery

From: Kevin Byer <kbyer@...>

No, you arent the only one who thinks this. But what you
may not have
realized is that I, like several other paladins, use archery
as a sport.
It requires a keen eye and a steady hand in order to thit
the mark and its
quite satifying to do so. I really only use my bow to play
and take hunt
small game. Have you every chased a deer with your sword.
:)

But of course, when its time to battle, i put away my bow
and bring out the
sword. I never entire a battle without being the first in
to swing.

On Tuesday, June 01, 1999 1:01 AM, Juha Palomaa (ECS)
[SMTP:juha.palomaa@...] wrote:
> From: "Juha Palomaa (ECS)" <juha.palomaa@...>
>
> Hail,
>
> Am I the only one that thinks archery is a non paladin
like skill ?
> I for one cant understand why they gave us this covardly
backstabbing
skill.
>
> Nothing is better than a charge into a camp filled with
filthy orcs !
>
> / Njelm, crusader of Kaladim
>

> > Aban

Mine is 13 dmg 50
